topicInfo.title: Student and Teacher Accounts
topicInfo.intro:
The admin area on Kerboodle displays all of the Student and Teacher accounts that are set up on your Kerboodle organisation.

From this page, you can create and import new accounts and manage any existing accounts.

Please note: We highly recommend that the tasks of importing and managing accounts are carried out by one person within your organisation as many schools have more than one department using Kerboodle.
